scenes.description: Intermission section displaying a rolling list of participants for the 'Eltama' bento gift project and promotional advertisements for AZKi and Tokino Sora's music and live performance goods.

subtitles.original: 差し入れを贈ってくださったそらとも・開拓者の皆様、本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: To all the Soratomo and Pioneers who sent gifts, thank you very much!
